translation.en: What's up, fellas?
Where were you? I stopped by to give you a lift.
translation.fr: T'étais où ? Je suis passé te prendre.

translation.en: Had things to do. How's the party?
translation.fr: J'avais à faire. Alors, cette fête ?

translation.en: Don't know. Just got here.
Well, hell, boys...
...let's drop in.
Oh, shit, yeah.
Tyler!
Come on, Caleb. It's not like it's gonna kill us...
translation.fr: Viens, Caleb. C'est pas la mort...

translation.en: ...yet.
So give me the scoop. Who's here?
The first thing you have to know is that Aaron Abbot is a prick.
translation.fr: Première info, Aaron Abbott est un sale con.

translation.en: -Treats girls like dirt. -Okay.
-Who's that? -The new guy.
He's looking over here.
Don't know much about him, but I intend to find out.
translation.fr: Je manque d'infos sur lui, mais je trouverai.

translation.en: He's cute.
-Hey, who's that chick with Kate? -Sarah something.
translation.fr: - C'est qui, avec Kate ? - Sarah quelque chose.

translation.en: She transferred in from a Boston public.
translation.fr: Elle vient d'un lycée public de Boston.

translation.en: She's kind of hot.
-Yo, Caleb. -They're here.
-Who are they? -The Sons of Ipswich.
-Hey, Kate. -Caleb.
-Hi. You're late. -I had a thing with the family.
translation.fr: T'es en retard. Un truc de famille.

translation.en: -Who's this? -My new roommate.
Sarah, this is Pogue Parry, Tyler Simms...
translation.fr: Sarah, voici Pogue Parry, Tyler Simms,

translation.en: -...Reid-- -Garwin. Reid Garwin.
translation.fr: Sarah, voici Pogue Parry, Tyler Simms, Reid... Reid Garwin.

translation.en: You know, Sarah's my grandmother's name.
translation.fr: Ma grand-mère s'appelle Sarah. Tu lui ressembles.

translation.en: -You kind of remind me of her. -Caleb Danvers.
translation.fr: Ma grand-mère s'appelle Sarah. Tu lui ressembles. Caleb Danvers. Tu ressembles pas du tout à ma grand-mère.

translation.en: And you don't bring my grandmother to mind in any way.
translation.fr: Caleb Danvers. Tu ressembles pas du tout à ma grand-mère.

translation.en: Good. Sarah.
How was your summer?
-I'm Kira. -Sarah.
Oh, right. From the Boston public.
Tell me, how does one go about getting into Spenser from a public?
translation.fr: Comment on intègre Spenser en venant du public ?

translation.en: -Why don't you give it a rest, Kira? -Why don't you give it a rest?
-I don't want any trouble, Aaron. -I'm sure you don't.
translation.fr: - Je veux pas d'ennuis. - Tu m'étonnes.

translation.en: You posers make me wanna puke.
-Is that right? -Hey, let it go.
I think you owe Kira an apology.
translation.fr: Selon moi, tu dois des excuses à Kira.

translation.en: Actually, I think Kira owes Sarah the apology.
translation.fr: Et selon moi, Kira doit des excuses à Sarah.

translation.en: You were being kind of bitchy.
Disgusting! You idiot!
Guys, Dylan just called.
He said he saw three cop cars headed this way on Old Dell Road.
translation.fr: Les flics arrivent par la vieille route des Dells !

translation.en: -You need a ride? -No, Sarah drove us out here.
translation.fr: - Je vous emmène ? - On est venus avec Sarah.

translation.en: -Will I see you back at the dorms? -It's getting late. I'm just gonna crash.
translation.fr: - On se voit à l'internat ? - Je vais dormir direct.

translation.en: Call me in the morning?
-I could use a lift. -No problem.
translation.fr: Il reste une place ? Bien sûr.

translation.en: -Hey, nice going back there. Caleb. -Chase.
translation.fr: C'était bien joué, tout à l'heure. Caleb. Chase.

translation.en: Thought that guy and I were about to go at it.
translation.fr: J'ai cru qu'on allait se latter.

translation.en: His friend's puking sure came at an opportune time.
translation.fr: Il a gerbé pile au bon moment.

translation.en: Didn't it, though?
Hey, guys, let's go. We gotta go before the cops come.
translation.fr: Faut y aller ! Les flics arrivent.

translation.en: Sarah wants you, man.
-That's bullshit. -Oh, now. Don't be jealous, Reid.
translation.fr: - Sarah te kiffe. - N'importe quoi. On est jaloux ?

translation.en: -My car won't start! -Hop in with us.
-I can't just leave it here! -I could fix it for you.
translation.fr: Je vais pas la laisser là ! - Je vais t'arranger ça. - Arrête !

translation.en: -Reid, don't. -It's not over yet, boys.
translation.fr: - Je vais t'arranger ça. - Arrête ! Je fais que commencer.

translation.en: Let it go. It's his life, man.
Try it again.
Thank you!
-Gotta bolt. Move over. -It's my car.
Move over, baby boy. Now!
No sweat.
We gotta pull over.
You wanna stop? That'll impress Harvard.
All right, what the hell? Let's lose them.
Cut across Marblehead. We might as well have some fun.
translation.fr: Passe par la côte, qu'on se marre.

translation.en: Lose them!
-Step on it. Go! -Stupid kids.
All right, guys, you ready?
Come on, Caleb. It's gonna take all of us.
translation.fr: Allez, Caleb. Faut qu'on s'y mette tous.

translation.en: Hey, they don't know. Hit the horn. Hit the horn!
-Holy shit, they're going over. -Harry Potter can kiss my ass!
translation.fr: Putain, ils y vont ! Harry Potter, tu l'as dans le cul !

translation.en: Stop the car! Stop the car!
Son of a bitch.
We must be the last ones in.
translation.fr: On est les derniers à rentrer.

translation.en: Well, this is us.
-Just a sec. -Oh, my God!
-Hate those things. -And they're all over the place here.
translation.fr: Je hais ces bestioles. Y en a plein, ici.

translation.en: See? Chivalry's not dead after all.
No, it just transferred in.
We're gonna go into town tomorrow for some things.
translation.fr: On fait des courses en ville demain.

translation.en: -Do you need to pick up any stuff? -Sure.
I'm in 311. Call me.
-He's hot, huh? -Listen to you.
translation.fr: Il est canon ! T'es pas croyable...

translation.en: -Thanks for the ride. -All right. Take it easy.
translation.fr: - Merci de m'avoir ramené. - Pas de problème.

translation.en: -I'll see you later, man. -Call me in the morning.
You're home early.
It's after midnight, Mother. What are you still doing up?
translation.fr: Il est plus de minuit, maman. Tu ne dors pas ?

translation.en: Thinking about my baby turning 18 this week.
translation.fr: Je pense à mon petit garçon qui aura 18 ans cette semaine.

translation.en: God. You look so much like him in this light.
translation.fr: Tu lui ressembles tant, dans cette lumière.

translation.en: You know, he was a year younger than you when we met.
translation.fr: Il avait un an de moins que toi, quand je l'ai connu.

translation.en: Did I ever tell you that?
Yeah. You've told me.
Now, let's get you up to bed.
So handsome.
He was the most beautiful man I'd ever seen.
translation.fr: Le plus bel homme que j'aie jamais vu.

translation.en: I'm so afraid I'll lose you like I did him.
translation.fr: J'ai peur de te perdre comme je l'ai perdu.

translation.en: How many times do I need to tell you that I'm not him?
translation.fr: Je t'ai déjà dit que je ne suis pas lui.

translation.en: That's the same thing he said about his father.
translation.fr: Il disait la même chose de son père.

translation.en: You know, these powers...
...that you and your friends developed when you were 13...
translation.fr: que tes amis et toi avez acquis à vos 13 ans

translation.en: ...are nothing compared with what you'll get when you ascend.
translation.fr: que tes amis et toi avez acquis à vos 13 ans ne sont rien à côté de ceux que tu auras à tes 18 ans.

translation.en: They are 1000 times stronger.
translation.fr: Ils sont mille fois plus puissants.

translation.en: They are so seductive.
You'll suddenly think...
...the world is yours for the taking.
translation.fr: que le monde est à tes pieds...

translation.en: And then you really start to use...
translation.fr: et... tu commenceras à en user,

translation.en: ...and use...
...aging each time. Taking bits of your life...
translation.fr: vieillissant plus à chaque fois. Ta vie s'effritera

translation.en: -...until there is nothing left. -I won't.
That's what he said.
I can't lose you both.
I won't survive it this time.
I won't.
So why do you call them "the Sons of Ipswich"?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu les appelles les fils d'Ipswich ?

translation.en: What are they? Like, a boy band?
You know what? I like you. You're funny. Not like all the other stuck-up bitches.
translation.fr: T'es marrante, toi. Pas comme les autres pouffes snobinardes.

translation.en: No. They're supposedly descendants of five families... ...that settled the Ipswich Colony in the 1600s.
translation.fr: Ils descendraient de 5 familles installées à Ipswich au 17e siècle.

translation.en: Old money.
Caleb and Reid were both checking you out tonight.
translation.fr: Caleb et Reid ont pas arrêté de te mater.

translation.en: If it were me, I'd go for Caleb.
Why?
He's just one of those majorly good guys.
Well, how do you mean?
He could stay here and party with the rest of us...
translation.fr: Au lieu de faire la fête ici avec nous,

translation.en: ...but he stays at home to take care of his mom.
translation.fr: il rentre s'occuper de sa mère.

translation.en: What's wrong with her?
After Caleb's dad died, she became a bit of an alcoholic.
translation.fr: Depuis la mort de son mari, elle picole.

translation.en: So is he seeing anyone?
So we are interested.
-So who's the fifth? -Fifth what?
Well, you said five families.
They say the fifth was killed during the witch-hunt.
-What? -Cool, huh?
Or creepy.
Couldn't see nothing but their taillights in the damn fog.
translation.fr: On voyait que leurs feux arrière,

translation.en: But I swear to God... ...it sure seemed like they went right off the damn cliffs.
translation.fr: mais j'aurais juré les avoir vus tomber de la falaise.

translation.en: What you were probably looking at...
...were the aircraft warning lights on the Marblehead lighthouse.
translation.fr: avec les feux de balisage du phare de Marblehead.

translation.en: Captain, we have a suspect vehicle with occupant back near the Dells.
translation.fr: Véhicule suspect avec passager près des Dells.

translation.en: Respond and advise.
We tried to wake him, but he's passed out cold.
translation.fr: On a voulu le réveiller, rien à faire.

translation.en: Doors are all locked.
Hey, kid!
Open up!
Give me your flashlight.
Break out the rear window.
Son.
Somebody there?
-Oh, my God. -Didn't mean to scare you. -Oh, my God. -Just got back.
translation.fr: Je voulais pas te faire peur. Je viens de rentrer.

translation.en: Sorry. I'm just a little freaked out.
It felt like someone was watching me in the showers.
translation.fr: Je me sentais observée, dans la douche.

translation.en: Let's take a look, shall we?
It's okay.
Don't see anyone.
-I'll catch you later, then. -Yeah, see you.
-What makes you think it was Reid? -It's always him.
translation.fr: - Pourquoi Reid ? - Qui d'autre ? Mais d'habitude,

translation.en: I've never felt it when one of us used The Power. Have you?
translation.fr: - Pourquoi Reid ? - Qui d'autre ? Mais d'habitude, je sens rien. Et toi ?

translation.en: No. I don't know, maybe it's because you're so close to ascending.
translation.fr: Non plus. C'est l'approche de ta consécration...

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe.
I'm telling you, it was strong enough to wake me out of a dead sleep.
translation.fr: Mais ça m'a tiré d'un sommeil de plomb.

translation.en: He's only using his powers to piss you off... ...because he's jealous you're ascending first, man.
translation.fr: Il te cherche parce qu'il t'en veut d'être le 1er consacré.

translation.en: I'm telling you, just-- Jesus!
What's going on, Caleb? Pick up.
Caleb, pick up the phone, man.
Caleb, what's going on?
I just saw a darkling.
It was in the form of that dead kid they found at the Dells.
translation.fr: Il ressemblait au mec mort aux Dells.

translation.en: I saw his picture this morning in the newspaper.
translation.fr: J'ai vu sa photo dans le journal.

translation.en: -But who'd send you a darkling? -I have no idea.
translation.fr: - Qui t'enverrait un spectre ? - Aucune idée.

translation.en: Something's wrong. I can feel it.
translation.fr: Il y a un truc qui cloche.

translation.en: We gotta talk to Reid tonight.
translation.fr: Faut parler à Reid ce soir.

translation.en: He'll probably be at Nicky's.
-We'll see him then. -Definitely.
-Here you go, Caleb. -Thanks.
-Oh, hey, Kate. What are you up to? -I'm just stocking up our room.
-Did you hear about the dead kid? -Yeah, I did.
translation.fr: T'as vu, le mort des Dells ? Ouais, je sais.

translation.en: Did you know him?
No. No, he just transferred in.
Yeah, I heard he lived on Reid and Tyler's floor.
translation.fr: Il était à l'étage de Reid et Tyler.

translation.en: You scared me.
I'm gonna see if Pogue wants to catch that new Brad Pitt flick this afternoon.
translation.fr: Je vais proposer à Pogue de voir le dernier Brad Pitt.

translation.en: -Who else wants to go? -I will.
I gotta run some errands for my mother.
translation.fr: J'ai des courses à faire pour ma mère.

translation.en: I already saw it.
-Do you feel like running errands? -Sure.
I wish I'd brought my camera. This place is so beautiful.
translation.fr: J'aurais dû prendre mon appareil, c'est magnifique !

translation.en: That's the old Putnam barn. What's left of it.
translation.fr: C'est la grange Putnam. Ou ce qu'il en reste.

translation.en: This whole place, for miles around, was the original Ipswich Colony.
translation.fr: C'est ici que s'étendait la colonie d'Ipswich.

translation.en: -So, what brought you to Spenser? -A scholarship.
translation.fr: - Qu'est-ce qui t'amène à Spenser ? - Une bourse.

translation.en: -But why Spenser? -I want to go to Harvard.
translation.fr: - Mais pourquoi ici ? - Je vise Harvard.

translation.en: -My father was class of '81. -That's so cool.
translation.fr: - Mon père est de la promo de 81. - C'est génial !

translation.en: -Kate told me he passed away. -You and Kate talk about me?
translation.fr: Kate m'a dit qu'il était décédé. Vous parlez de moi ?

translation.en: Well, you know, just girl stuff.
It's our family's first colony house.
translation.fr: La première maison de mes ancêtres.

translation.en: -Wait. Somebody lives here? -Just our caretaker, Gorman.
translation.fr: Elle est habitée ? Par notre gardien, Gorman.

translation.en: Gorman! It's me! It's okay!
translation.fr: Gorman, c'est moi ! Tout va bien !

translation.en: -He doesn't see that well anymore. -You think?
translation.fr: - Sa vue a baissé. - Tu crois ?

translation.en: -Who's with you? -Just a friend.
translation.fr: - Qui est avec toi ? - Une amie.

translation.en: -I'll be right back, okay? -Okay.
-You should be more careful. -I know, Gorman.
translation.fr: - Ça n'est pas prudent. - Je sais.

translation.en: -Is there anything else he needs? -No.
I'll see you next week, then.
-Okay? -Yeah. Yeah, I'm okay.
So you wanna shower or change first?
translation.fr: Tu veux te refaire une beauté, avant ?

translation.en: -For what? -We're going to Nicky's.
translation.fr: Avant quoi ? On va au Nicky's.

translation.en: What's Nicky's?
Oh, hey, baby! You missed a great movie.
translation.fr: Mon cœur ! T'as raté un super film.

translation.en: Yeah, I had to get my bike fixed.
That's cool. Chase hung out and kept me company.
translation.fr: Pas grave, Chase m'a tenu compagnie.

translation.en: I'll just bet he did.
-What's up, man? -It's all good.
You want something to eat?
I'll just pick at whatever you're having.
Can I get a burger, fries and a Coke?
-Corner pocket. -Great shot.
Well, well, well....
-How long you guys been here? -A bit.
translation.fr: - Vous êtes là depuis longtemps ? - Assez.

translation.en: Just been playing Aaron and Bordy, and-- Would you look at that?
translation.fr: On a joué avec Aaron et Bordy et... Visez-moi ça !

translation.en: -Blue, cotton. -Pink, lace.
Boys, that girl hasn't worn panties since she was 12.
translation.fr: Elle porte plus de slip depuis ses 12 ans.

translation.en: Yeah. Thanks, boys.
Keep the change.
Next time.
You guys are real tight, huh?
Families are real close. We kind of grew up together.
translation.fr: Par nos familles. On a grandi ensemble.

translation.en: -We're kind of like brothers. -That must have been nice.
translation.fr: Comme des frères. Ça devait être sympa.

translation.en: -The best two out of three. -Okay.
Hey, Chase. Mind if I get in a game?
Reid and Tyler are here.
-Where? -Pool tables. With Aaron and the boys.
translation.fr: - Où ? - Au billard, avec Aaron et les autres.

translation.en: Great. That's trouble.
So Caleb tells me you guys are swimmers.
translation.fr: Caleb m'a dit que vous nagiez.

translation.en: Spenser's best. State finals twice.
translation.fr: Les meilleurs de Spenser, champions inter-lycées.

translation.en: I swam for Hastings. I was their freestyle man.
translation.fr: J'ai nagé pour Hastings. En nage libre.

translation.en: You won't be here. That's Caleb's swim.
translation.fr: Ici, c'est la spécialité de Caleb.

translation.en: -Okay, what just happened? -What?
We were sitting here together, having fun...
...and now we're watching them have fun.
That's what girls do. You know boys and their toys.
translation.fr: Comme des filles ! Les mecs et leurs joujoux...

translation.en: -Give me a quarter. -Why?
Just give me a quarter. I'll show you what girls do.
translation.fr: Donne, je te montre un jeu de filles.

translation.en: Gentlemen, it was a pleasure.
Hey, it's Reid and Tyler. Grab my jacket.
translation.fr: C'est Reid et Tyler. Prends mon blouson.

translation.en: -You guys need help? -Just stay with the girls.
Let's go. Bring it on, man.
He made the shot, dickhead. You bet him he couldn't and he did.
translation.fr: Il a réussi le coup, ducon. Fallait pas parier.

translation.en: We ain't paying you shit, so if you don't like it--
What's the problem?
He bet me I couldn't make a combo shot, and I did.
translation.fr: Il a parié que je ferais pas une doublette et... - je l'ai faite. - Laisse tomber.

translation.en: -Everyone just forget about it, okay? -Hey! Take it someplace else, ladies.
translation.fr: - je l'ai faite. - Laisse tomber. Du balai, les filles.

translation.en: -Now. -Whatever you say, Nicky.
translation.fr: Presto. C'est toi qui vois, Nicky.

translation.en: -What were you thinking? -We were just playing them.
translation.fr: - A quoi tu joues ? - C'était pas méchant.

translation.en: Yeah, come on, Caleb. They were suckers for it.
translation.fr: On les a eus comme des bleus.

translation.en: Why don't you quit being such a pussy?
I'm not finished with you yet.
Reid, stop.
What will it take for you to get it?
translation.fr: Comment il faut te le dire ?

translation.en: It's addictive, you moron!
You've seen what it can do if you abuse it.
translation.fr: Tu sais ce qui arrive si t'abuses.

translation.en: You want that? That's your business.
translation.fr: C'est ce que tu veux ? Ça te regarde.

translation.en: But if you use in the open, like you did tonight, you risk exposing us all.
translation.fr: Mais avec le show de ce soir, tu pourrais nous griller tous.

translation.en: And that I won't let happen.
translation.fr: Et ça, je laisserai pas faire.

translation.en: -My power's greater than yours. -Not until you ascend.
translation.fr: J'ai plus de pouvoir que toi. Pas avant ta consécration.

translation.en: All right, go for it, tough guy.
-Stop it! This is crazy. -It's for his own good!
translation.fr: - Fais pas ça ! - Faut qu'il comprenne !

translation.en: Keep using like you did tonight and last night...
translation.fr: Continue comme ce soir et hier,

translation.en: ...you'll be as good as dead.
So I fixed her car. Big deal!
translation.fr: J'ai réparé sa voiture, et alors ?

translation.en: Don't play me, Reid! I'm talking later and you know it.
translation.fr: Je te parle d'après, tu le sais bien.

translation.en: The hell I do!
I didn't use later.
It's not right using on each other, Caleb. Tell it to Reid.
translation.fr: - Ça se fait pas, entre nous. - Dis-le à Reid.

translation.en: Reid's lying. It had to have been him.
How do you know?
Because it wasn't you. Tyler doesn't have the balls to lie to me.
translation.fr: Parce que c'était pas toi. Tyler oserait pas me mentir.

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
-You okay? -Yeah.
-Yeah, I'm fine. -Let's go.
translation.fr: Oui, ça va. On y va ?

translation.en: Yeah, let's get out of here.
Thanks again for a great day. I had fun.
translation.fr: Merci pour cette journée. C'était super.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, me too.
Listen, I'm sorry about Gorman. He's just not used to seeing me with anyone.
translation.fr: Désolé pour Gorman. Il me voit rarement accompagné.

translation.en: I think I'll survive.
Fact is, you're the only girl I've ever taken out there.
translation.fr: En fait... t'es la première fille que j'amène là-bas.

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
-And why is that? -I'm not sure just yet.
translation.fr: Pourquoi ça ? J'en suis pas encore sûr.

translation.en: I just saw the same darkling you saw last night. That dead kid at the Dells.
translation.fr: J'ai vu le spectre. Le jeune mort des Dells.

translation.en: What the hell is it?
I don't know. It's starting to freak me out.
translation.fr: J'en sais rien. Ça me fout les jetons.

translation.en: I'm telling you, someone's using powers... ...and I mean bigtime.
translation.fr: Quelqu'un se sert de ses pouvoirs et il met le paquet.

translation.en: And I intend to find out who.
Mr. Danvers...
translation.fr: M. Danvers, le doyen réclame votre présence

translation.en: ...Provost Higgins requests the pleasure of your company after class.
translation.fr: M. Danvers, le doyen réclame votre présence après le cours.

translation.en: We're going to study four American contemporary writers of fiction.
translation.fr: Nous allons étudier 4 romanciers américains contemporains.

translation.en: First is Cormac McCarthy, then Tim O'Brien...
translation.fr: D'abord Cormac McCarthy, puis Tim O'Brien,

translation.en: ...Kent Haruf, and last but not least...
-...Stephen King. -Yeah! Dreamcatcher was the shit!
Thank you, Mr. Garwin, but no. My choice is The Shining.
translation.fr: Merci, M. Garwin, mais mon choix se porte sur Shining.

translation.en: This is not the kind of publicity this institution is interested in.
translation.fr: Notre établissement se passerait bien de ce genre de publicité.

translation.en: You wouldn't know anything about it, would you, Mr. Danvers?
translation.fr: Sauriez-vous quelque chose à ce sujet ?

translation.en: But you would know about a fight at a local bar last night.
translation.fr: Et au sujet d'une rixe dans un bar, hier soir ?

translation.en: -Sir, if I could-- -And if I'm correct...
translation.fr: Si je puis... Il me semble... que Chase Collins était avec vous.

translation.en: ...Chase Collins was with you?
translation.fr: Il me semble... que Chase Collins était avec vous.

translation.en: Chase Collins comes to us with a brilliant academic record...
translation.fr: Chase Collins a un excellent dossier scolaire et sa famille a fait une généreuse dotation

translation.en: ...and his family trust has made a generous endowment...
translation.fr: et sa famille a fait une généreuse dotation

translation.en: ...to this institution.
I want to make sure he has a positive experience at Spenser.
translation.fr: Je veux qu'il en garde un bon souvenir.

translation.en: -Do I make myself clear? -Yes, sir.
Good.
I understand you and Chase have already bonded...
translation.fr: Il paraît que vous avez déjà lié amitié,

translation.en: ...and I would appreciate it if you would continue...
translation.fr: et je vous saurai gré de continuer

translation.en: ...to take him under your wing, make sure his stay here is a pleasant one.
translation.fr: à vous assurer que son séjour ici est agréable.

translation.en: No more fights.
What is that?
Caleb's family history.
Did you know that the witchcraft thing started here in Ipswich?
translation.fr: La chasse aux sorcières a commencé ici.

translation.en: Every time I ask Pogue about it, he just tells me it's all nonsense.
translation.fr: Pogue dit toujours que c'est des bêtises.

translation.en: So, what did the provost want?
Someone told him about the fight at Nicky's.
translation.fr: Il est au courant, pour la bagarre.

translation.en: Feel like elaborating on that?
You got a piece of glass in your face. Hold on.
translation.fr: T'as un bout de verre, là.

translation.en: -Say my name! -Grow up, dude.
What are you looking at, fag?
That thing between your legs.
It's like a penis, only smaller.
translation.fr: On dirait un pénis en plus petit.

translation.en: Hey, let him go, Aaron!
Don't be so sensitive, Aaron.
Size isn't everything.
translation.fr: C'est pas la taille qui compte.

translation.en: My man.
Up for some foosball?
I have dinner with Sarah, but I think I can hang out for a while.
translation.fr: Je dîne avec Sarah, mais je suis dispo avant.

translation.en: -What about you? -No, man. I'm cool.
translation.fr: Et toi ? Non merci, sans moi.

translation.en: You're being ridiculous! What is your problem?
translation.fr: - C'est quoi, ton problème ? - C'est Chase.

translation.en: -Chase is my problem. -What, are you jealous?
translation.fr: - C'est quoi, ton problème ? - C'est Chase. - T'es jaloux ? - Traîne pas avec lui.

translation.en: -I don't want you hanging around him. -Look, he is just a friend.
translation.fr: - T'es jaloux ? - Traîne pas avec lui. C'est qu'un ami.

translation.en: Yeah, right. I'm sure he's interested in just being friends.
translation.fr: C'est ça, il s'intéresse qu'à ton amitié !

translation.en: This is beyond idiotic.
Thanks for dinner.
-How about Saturday? -What about Saturday?
-It's the Fall Fest. -Oh, Fall Fest.
translation.fr: C'est le bal d'automne. Le bal d'automne...

translation.en: Just wondering if you wanted to go with me.
And, also, it happens to be my birthday.
I don't know.
I'd love to go with you.
-I should go. -Yeah. Yeah, you should.
-No. I mean, back to the dorms. -Yeah, I know what you mean.
translation.fr: Non, que j'aille à l'internat ! J'avais compris.

translation.en: I'm really gonna go.
This is me leaving.
Sleep tight.
I hate him when he's like this.
He's been jealous since the day we met. It drives me crazy.
translation.fr: Il est jaloux depuis le début, ça me soûle.

translation.en: You don't hate Pogue. You guys are perfect for each other.
translation.fr: Tu le détestes pas. Vous allez bien ensemble.

translation.en: Maybe not.
Maybe it's time to check out something new.
And maybe that's what Pogue's picking up on.
-This is the eighth time he's called. -So talk to him.
translation.fr: Huit fois en une heure. Parle-lui.

translation.en: No. Not until he stops being an idiot.
I'll bet Caleb's not the jealous type.
translation.fr: Je parie que Caleb n'est pas jaloux.

translation.en: Come on, Pogue!
-He really is good. -He's the best.
translation.fr: - Il est vraiment bon. - Le meilleur.

translation.en: I hear you swim a mean freestyle.
-That's what they tell me. -Let's see what you got.
translation.fr: C'est ce qu'on me dit. Montre-moi ça.

translation.en: You okay, man?
There you are. Had us going there for a second.
translation.fr: Te revoilà. Tu nous as fait peur.

translation.en: Whacked your head pretty good.
Lucky for you, Chase was there to get you out... ...before you sucked up the pool.
translation.fr: Chase t'a repêché avant que tu boives la piscine.

translation.en: He also whipped your ass.
translation.fr: Et il t'a mis une tôle.

translation.en: It became apparent that the view of civil liberties...
translation.fr: Ostensiblement, la protection des libertés civiques

translation.en: ...needing no special protection was not widely shared.
translation.fr: Ostensiblement, la protection des libertés civiques était une priorité.

translation.en: Come in. Thank you.
Twelve amendments were suggested, 10 eventually ratified.
Called the what, Ms. Snider?
-The Bill of Rights. -Right you are.
translation.fr: La Déclaration des droits. Tout à fait.

translation.en: Arguably, the first being the most important. Read it for us, Mr. Simms.
translation.fr: Dont le 1er est le plus important. Lisez-le-nous, M. Simms.

translation.en: Mr. Collins, you're wanted in the provost's office.
translation.fr: M. Collins... le doyen vous demande.

translation.en: "Congress shall make no law... ...respecting an establishment of religion...
translation.fr: Le Congrès ne légiférera pas sur les institutions religieuses,

translation.en: ...or prohibiting the free exercise thereof...
translation.fr: il veillera à la liberté de culte,

translation.en: ...or abridging the freedom of speech, or of the press...
...or the right of the people peaceably to assemble...."
translation.fr: et au droit de se rassembler...

translation.en: -Provost Higgins. You wanted to...? -Chase, come in.
You know one of our students lost his life... ...a few nights back at the Dells.
translation.fr: Un de nos élèves est mort il y a quelques jours.

translation.en: Yes, I heard.
-Did you know him? -No, sir. Why?
translation.fr: Vous le connaissiez ? Non, monsieur. Pourquoi ?

translation.en: His car was returned to his parents.
translation.fr: Sa voiture a été rendue à ses parents.

translation.en: His mother was kind enough to send this back to us.
translation.fr: Sa mère nous a envoyé ceci.

translation.en: -My student ID. I lost it that night. -It was in the back seat.
translation.fr: Ma carte d'étudiant. Je l'ai perdue ce soir-là. Trouvée à l'arrière.

translation.en: That's odd. I wonder how he got it.
-Thank you, sir. -You're welcome.
translation.fr: - Merci, monsieur. - Je vous en prie.

translation.en: I understand you've become close with Caleb and his friends.
translation.fr: Vous êtes donc proche de Caleb et ses amis.

translation.en: Yeah. They're great guys, sir.
I agree. You couldn't have picked a better bunch.
translation.fr: Vous n'auriez pas pu mieux choisir.

translation.en: I think so too.
-Am I gonna see you tonight? -I hope so.
translation.fr: - On se voit ce soir ? - J'espère bien.

translation.en: Listen, I have something to do first. I'll give you a call later, okay?
translation.fr: J'ai un truc à faire d'abord. - Je te rappelle. - Je bouge pas.

translation.en: -I'll be in my room. -Okay.
translation.fr: - Je te rappelle. - Je bouge pas.

translation.en: What'd she say about Kate? Why won't she call me back?
translation.fr: Elle a dit pourquoi Kate rappelle pas ?

translation.en: She's still pissed at you.
-Why are we doing this? -I saw the darkling again.
translation.fr: - On fait quoi, là ? - J'ai revu le spectre.

translation.en: Yeah, but why break into the admissions office?
Because I wanna know more about Chase Collins.
translation.fr: Je veux en savoir plus sur Chase Collins.

translation.en: Look, I don't even like the guy. Are you sure you're not just imagining this?
translation.fr: C'est pas pour le défendre, mais t'es sûr de pas te faire un film ?

translation.en: I'm telling you, his eyes were as black as night in the pool today.
translation.fr: Ses yeux étaient trop noirs, dans l'eau.

translation.en: Well, how sick is she?
She came in complaining of chills and a headache.
Within an hour, she had a 101-degree temperature.
-What could it be? -The doctor's checking her now.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qu'elle a ? Le médecin l'examine.

translation.en: -We'll call you when we know more. -It's okay. I'm coming over there.
translation.fr: On vous tient au courant. Pas la peine, j'arrive.

translation.en: They died in a car accident.
translation.fr: Morts dans un accident de voiture.

translation.en: It says Chase's father just lost control.
translation.fr: Son père aurait perdu le contrôle.

translation.en: His real name was Pope.
Chase Goodwin Pope. Born July 14th, 1988.
translation.fr: Chase Goodwin Pope, né le 14 juillet 88.

translation.en: The Collins adopted him after his mother died... ...when he was 2 years old.
translation.fr: Adopté à la mort de sa mère, à 2 ans.

translation.en: -When did you say his birthday was? -July 14th.
That's the same day his adoptive parents died.
translation.fr: Quand ses parents adoptifs sont morts.

translation.en: -What year was he born? -1988.
They died on his 18th birthday.
Why are you taking her to the hospital at Gloucester?
translation.fr: Pourquoi l'emmener à l'hôpital de Gloucester ?

translation.en: Her temperature's jumped to 105...
...and she's showing symptoms of anaphylactic shock.
translation.fr: et tout indique un choc anaphylactique.

translation.en: -What does that mean? -It's a severe allergic reaction.
translation.fr: C'est-à-dire ? C'est une réaction allergique aiguë.

translation.en: -To what? -We're not sure.
It's as if she'd been bitten by hundreds of insects.
Like spiders.
Goodwin Pope. Goodwin Pope.
Agnes Goodwin Pope.
-That's where I've heard it before. -What are you talking about?
translation.fr: - C'est là que je l'ai lu. - Quoi donc ?

translation.en: The Book of Damnation. They used to call her Goody Pope.
translation.fr: Le Livre des damnés. Goody Pope.

translation.en: Do you remember her?
I haven't read the Book since we were kids.
translation.fr: Je l'ai pas lu depuis tout petit.

translation.en: Just call Reid and Tyler.
I told them everything. About the darkling, what we found in his file....
translation.fr: Je leur ai tout dit : le spectre et le dossier de Chase.

translation.en: It's a list of names...
...who brought charges against John Putnam and his family...
translation.fr: qui ont incriminé les Putnam au procès de Salem.

translation.en: ...during the Salem hunt. Pope was one of them.
translation.fr: qui ont incriminé les Putnam au procès de Salem. Pope était l'une d'entre eux.

translation.en: Goody Pope.
Widow of Jacob, mother to Hagen.
translation.fr: la veuve de Jacob, mère de Hagen.

translation.en: So what?
So she claims that John Putnam came to her as an incubus in her dreams...
translation.fr: John Putnam lui serait apparu en rêve sous la forme d'un incube,

translation.en: ...after she was widowed.
The Book also records births and deaths during the damnation.
translation.fr: Le Livre parle de naissances et de morts durant la Damnation.

translation.en: Goody Pope's husband, Jacob, died June 4th, 1692.
translation.fr: Le mari de Goody Pope, Jacob, est mort le 4 juin 1692.

translation.en: Her son, Hagen, was born April 11th, 1693.
translation.fr: Son fils, Hagen, est né le 11 avril 1693.

translation.en: That's 10 months and 24 days later.
If what you're saying is true...
...and Hagen Pope is the bastard son of John Putnam...
translation.fr: et que Hagen Pope est le fils de John Putnam,

translation.en: ...then the fifth bloodline in the Covenant didn't end in Salem.
translation.fr: la 5e famille du Pacte n'a pas disparu à Salem.

translation.en: -And Chase is one of us. -That's crazy.
translation.fr: Et Chase est l'un des nôtres. C'est insensé !

translation.en: He can't be.
The night after the party at the Dells...
...someone was using. The Power was strong enough to wake me.
translation.fr: quelqu'un a exercé son pouvoir si fort que ça m'a réveillé.

translation.en: The next night, it happened again.
-I felt it then. -See? I told you.
I felt it too.
When you said it wasn't you, were you lying?
translation.fr: T'as nié que c'était toi. Tu mentais ?

translation.en: -You swear? -I swear.
translation.fr: Tu le jures ? Je le jure.

translation.en: Then it was him.
-Hey, could I call you--? -Caleb, Kate's been attacked.
translation.fr: Je peux te rapp... Kate a été attaquée.

translation.en: Wait, wait. What?
They say it's like she's been bitten by spiders...
translation.fr: Elle aurait comme des piqûres d'araignées...

translation.en: ...and I had this terrible nightmare about spiders.
I'm scared, Caleb. Something weird is happening.
translation.fr: J'ai peur. C'est étrange, tout ça.

translation.en: Okay, listen. I want you to go back to your dorm... ...and wait for me there.
translation.fr: Tu vas aller dans ta chambre et m'attendre.

translation.en: -I'll see you soon, okay? -Okay.
He's put a spell on Kate.
translation.fr: Il a jeté un sort à Kate.

translation.en: What are you talking about? What kind of spell?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu dis ? Quel sort ?

translation.en: Creation.
Spiders.
They're taking her to a hospital in Gloucester.
Don't do anything until we know what he wants.
translation.fr: - Voyons ce qu'il veut... - C'est Kate !

translation.en: Come to save Little Miss Muffet, have we?
Well, you're too late.
A spider came and sat down beside her... ...and frightened Miss Muffet away.
translation.fr: Les araignées sont venues et elles ont fait leur boulot.

translation.en: You hurt Kate, and I'll kill you.
translation.fr: Fais-lui du mal et je te tue !

translation.en: Hurt her?
I only used her to get to you.
It's you that I'm gonna hurt.
translation.fr: C'est à toi que je vais faire mal.

translation.en: And you're just my bait to get to Caleb.
These are her things.
Why don't you go back to the dorm and get some sleep?
If I hear anything, I'll call you.
translation.fr: Si j'ai du nouveau, je t'appelle.

translation.en: What's wrong?
Have you seen Pogue?
No, but I called him and told him about Kate.
translation.fr: Non, mais je l'ai prévenu, pour Kate.

translation.en: Well, how is she?
Not so good. But they said they'd call if there are any changes.
translation.fr: Assez mal, mais ils m'appelleront en cas d'évolution.

translation.en: Maybe this is him.
Pogue's been in an accident.
Stop right there.
Close the door.
Let's just keep this between the Sons of Ipswich.
translation.fr: Il faut que ça reste entre les fils d'Ipswich.

translation.en: Don't hurt her. She has nothing to do with this.
translation.fr: Laisse-la. Elle n'a rien à voir là-dedans.

translation.en: Whether she lives or dies is entirely up to you, my friend.
translation.fr: Sa survie ne dépend que de toi, l'ami.

translation.en: You can't imagine what it was like growing up not knowing what this was.
translation.fr: T'imagines pas ce que c'était, grandir sans comprendre tout ça.

translation.en: When I finally found my real father, he filled in all the missing pieces.
translation.fr: Quand j'ai enfin trouvé mon vrai père, il m'a tout expliqué.

translation.en: But it was too late. I was hooked.
By then, he was such a bitter old man--
translation.fr: A l'époque, c'était déjà un vieil homme si aigri...

translation.en: Or I should say, bitter, old, young man.
translation.fr: ou plutôt un vieux jeune homme, devrais-je dire,

translation.en: --that all he wanted to do was end the suffering.
translation.fr: qu'il n'aspirait qu'à abréger ses souffrances.

translation.en: Like all our bloodline before us... ...he was more than willing to break the laws...
translation.fr: Comme tous nos ancêtres, il a allègrement transgressé les lois

translation.en: ...of your sacred little club.
translation.fr: Comme tous nos ancêtres, il a allègrement transgressé les lois de votre sacro-saint petit club.

translation.en: So I got him to give me his share of The Power.
translation.fr: Je l'ai décidé à me léguer son pouvoir.

translation.en: And he died knowing that his son was going to get revenge...
translation.fr: Et il est mort en sachant que son fils se vengerait

translation.en: ...on your Covenant.
You keep her in that spell, and she'll die.
I know.
What is this all about? I mean, what do you want?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu fais tout ça ? Que veux-tu ?

translation.en: Want?
I'm Chase Collins.
I have everything I could possibly want.
translation.fr: J'ai déjà tout ce que je veux.

translation.en: It's what I need.
translation.fr: Mais ce dont j'ai besoin, c'est...

translation.en: More power.
Tomorrow night, birthday boy...
...at the exact moment when you ascend...
translation.fr: au moment précis de ta consécration,

translation.en: ...be at Putnam Barn...
...where you will will me your power.
translation.fr: où tu me légueras ton pouvoir.

translation.en: Do that, and I'll let her live.
translation.fr: A cette condition, je la laisserai vivre.

translation.en: And Pogue, Kate, Reid and Tyler and your mom...
translation.fr: Ainsi que Pogue, Kate, Reid, Tyler, ta mère...

translation.en: ...and what's left of the families.
translation.fr: et ce qu'il reste des familles.

translation.en: And don't think I won't kill them.
translation.fr: N'imagine pas que j'hésiterai à les tuer.

translation.en: It comes natural to me.
Just ask my adoptive parents.
You killed that kid at the Dells.
translation.fr: Tu as tué ce jeune, aux Dells.

translation.en: Well, he caught me doing a little magic.
translation.fr: Il m'a vu jeter un sort.

translation.en: At first, he wasn't sure, but then, well...
translation.fr: Au début, il doutait, mais après...

translation.en: ...he just wouldn't leave it alone.
So I caught a ride with him over to the bonfire.
translation.fr: alors j'ai tenu à l'accompagner à la fête.

translation.en: What are you doing? Just making sure I'm making my point.
translation.fr: - Tu fais quoi ? - J'affûte mes arguments.

translation.en: Do you see my problem here?
translation.fr: Tu vois où est mon problème ?

translation.en: I like to use. A lot.
Only...
...no one ever told me about...
...the effects and the damage.
The addiction.
And we both know what happens, now, don't we?
translation.fr: On sait tous les deux ce que ça provoque.

translation.en: ...the way I see it...
...I add your power to what I already have.
translation.fr: je vais ajouter ton pouvoir au mien.

translation.en: It won't stop the aging.
Your father obviously found out the hard way.
translation.fr: Ton père l'a visiblement appris à ses dépens.

translation.en: My father never had this kind of power.
translation.fr: Il avait moins de pouvoir que moi.

translation.en: It doesn't work like that.
It's the body that wears down, not the power.
translation.fr: C'est le corps qui s'épuise, pas le pouvoir.

translation.en: Just think of yourself as a sacrificial lamb.
translation.fr: Dis-toi que tu es l'agneau sacrificiel.

translation.en: ...you're already their golden boy.
Why not go out a real hero?
So tomorrow night, the barn.
Where it all started.
A birthday party. Just you and me.
translation.fr: Fêtons ton anniversaire. Rien que nous deux.

translation.en: It's either you...
...or them...
...brother.
Don't leave her like that. She'll die.
translation.fr: Ne la laisse pas comme ça. Elle en mourra.

translation.en: What happened?
-You passed out when I told you-- -What?
translation.fr: - Tu t'es évanouie quand j'ai dit... - Quoi ?

translation.en: -Pogue's been in an accident. -Is he okay?
translation.fr: Pogue a eu un accident. Comment va-t-il ?

translation.en: Hey, hey, take it easy.
-What? -Stay away.
He's more powerful...
...than you can imagine.
Hey, don't worry. Don't worry about that.
We can't stop him.
-How is he? -He's hurt pretty bad.
translation.fr: Comment il va ? Pas fort. Où est Sarah ?

translation.en: -Where's Sarah? -Waiting room.
translation.fr: Pas fort. Où est Sarah ? En salle d'attente.

translation.en: I say we all go after Chase. Right now.
Listen, it may not be that easy.
You guys stay here with Pogue. Call me if there's a change.
translation.fr: Restez avec lui. Appelez-moi s'il y a du nouveau.

translation.en: How's Pogue?
He's not good.
What about Kate? Have you heard anything?
They stabilized her, but she's still really sick.
translation.fr: Etat stable mais elle est mal en point.

translation.en: Caleb, look me in the eye and tell me the truth.
The spiders.
I read about them. They're one of the charges against John Putnam.
translation.fr: J'ai lu les accusations contre John Putnam.

translation.en: They're some kind of spell, aren't they?
translation.fr: Elles font partie d'un sortilège, non ?

translation.en: I wanna show you something...
translation.fr: Je vais te montrer quelque chose...

translation.en: ...and then I'll explain everything.
Don't be afraid.
What about your caretaker?
It'll be okay.
-What are you doing? -It's all right.
translation.fr: - A quoi joues-tu ? - T'en fais pas.

translation.en: -Caleb.... -This is important to me, Gorman.
It's okay.
This is William Danvers III, my father.
translation.fr: Voici William Danvers III. Mon père.

translation.en: He's 44 years old.
Every generation, the bloodlines produce only one:
translation.fr: A chaque génération, il en naît un par famille.

translation.en: The eldest male.
And you've always had this power?
translation.fr: Et tu as toujours eu ce pouvoir ?

translation.en: At 13, you get a taste of it. It's a test, in a way.
translation.fr: A 13 ans, on a un avant-goût. Une sorte de test.

translation.en: At 18, we ascend, and our powers fully mature...
translation.fr: A 18 ans, c'est la consécration. Nos pouvoirs culminent

translation.en: ...and it's seductive.
And some can handle it, and others, like my father, couldn't.
translation.fr: Certains résistent, d'autres, comme mon père, succombent.

translation.en: Tonight, at 12 minutes past 11, I'll ascend.
translation.fr: Cette nuit, à 23h12, ce sera ma consécration.

translation.en: And what if you don't will him your share?
translation.fr: Et si tu lui lègues rien ?

translation.en: He's already got his father's. It makes him very powerful.
translation.fr: Il a le pouvoir de son père. C'est énorme.

translation.en: And what if someone wills you their share?
It's against the Covenant laws. If it weren't, I wouldn't let them.
translation.fr: Même si le Pacte l'autorisait, je refuserais.

translation.en: -Why not? -When one ascends...
translation.fr: Pourquoi ? A la consécration, le pouvoir devient ta vie.

translation.en: ...The Power becomes your life.
translation.fr: A la consécration, le pouvoir devient ta vie.

translation.en: That's why it ages you.
Will it away, and you die.
translation.fr: Si tu le lègues, tu meurs.

translation.en: Caleb, you cannot do this alone. We have to go to the others.
translation.fr: N'y va pas seul, faisons appel aux autres.

translation.en: We can't do that. He'll kill us all, including you.
translation.fr: Impossible. Il nous tuera tous. Même toi.

translation.en: Pogue was the final warning.
-We have to go to your father. -No.
I know what you're thinking, Mother, and you know what'll happen.
But he loves you.
Well, then, he'll die with that secret.
translation.fr: Alors il mourra avec ce secret-là.

translation.en: -Where's Sarah? -Upstairs, changing.
translation.fr: Où est Sarah ? A l'étage, elle se change.

translation.en: -You should never have involved her. -You're right.
translation.fr: Il ne fallait pas la mêler à ça. Tu as raison.

translation.en: But I can't change the past...
translation.fr: Mais ce qui est fait est fait.

translation.en: ...and he's using her against me, all of you...
translation.fr: Et il vous utilise tous contre moi.

translation.en: ...and it's going to stop.
I want you to take Sarah to the dance.
I'll meet you there. I don't think he'll try anything in the open.
translation.fr: Je vous rejoins. Il ne tentera rien en public.

translation.en: Would you just let us help you? You know we've got your back.
translation.fr: Laisse-nous t'aider ! Tu sais qu'on est là pour toi.

translation.en: I know you do.
But please, just once, do what I ask.
translation.fr: Mais pour une fois, faites ce que je dis.

translation.en: You look beautiful, my dear.
-Ready? -Yeah.
Why can't I go with you?
-I won't risk you. -I'm scared.
Don't be.
-I'll see you soon. -You better.
translation.fr: A tout à l'heure. J'espère bien.

translation.en: I promise.
Be careful. I'll call you.
-Hey, any sign of him? -No.
Good. Listen, I'm on my way. If he does show...
translation.fr: Parfait. Je suis en route. S'il se montre, par pitié,

translation.en: ...please promise me you won't do anything stupid.
translation.fr: S'il se montre, par pitié, pas de bêtises.

translation.en: -How's Sarah doing? Can I talk to her? -Yeah, she's fine. Hang on.
translation.fr: Sarah va bien ? Oui, je te la passe.

translation.en: -She was just here. -Guys, what's going on?
translation.fr: Elle était là... Qu'est-ce qui se passe ?

translation.en: What's your plan? You can't beat me, you know.
translation.fr: T'as un plan ? Tu fais pas le poids.

translation.en: Something's happened.
You know...
...I'm just getting the feeling that...
...you're not gonna keep up your end of the bargain...
translation.fr: que tu vas pas respecter le contrat,

translation.en: ...so I took out a little insurance policy.
translation.fr: alors j'ai pris une petite assurance.

translation.en: She does look quite stunning.
You touch her, and she dies.
In fact, time's running out for Sarah.
So why don't we get down to business?
Witchy.
Oops, wait.
Did I just say, "witch"?
All right. Tell you what. I'll make this easy for you.
translation.fr: Voilà ce que je propose : je te simplifie la vie.

translation.en: How about an accident?
You lose control of your car on the way to the pathetic little dance.
translation.fr: Un accident de voiture en allant à ton bal minable.

translation.en: Trust me. I'm good at car accidents.
translation.fr: Je suis doué pour les accidents.

translation.en: Everyone'll miss you.
They'll say great things about you.
translation.fr: Ils diront beaucoup de bien de toi.

translation.en: Only the Covenant will know the real truth.
translation.fr: Seuls ceux du Pacte sauront la vérité.

translation.en: But, to them, you'll become a legend.
translation.fr: Mais pour eux, tu deviendras une légende.

translation.en: The one who gave his life for them.
translation.fr: Celui qui a donné sa vie pour eux.

translation.en: How about you let her go, and I let you live out your life?
translation.fr: Et si tu la laissais partir ? Je te laisserais vivre ta vie.

translation.en: How about I make you my "weyotch"?
translation.fr: Et si je faisais de toi ma sorcière à tout faire ?

translation.en: I'll never will you my power.
Then it looks like trouble for Sarah.
I'll never let that happen.
Fine. Let's do it your way.
Like taking candy from a baby.
Easy as pie.
-You find her? -No.
Twelve minutes past 11.
Happy birthday, Caleb.
Are we ascending?
Finally!
Scary, huh, Caleb...
...this new power you get when you ascend?
translation.fr: ce pouvoir que donne la consécration ?

translation.en: Frankly, I don't think you're cut out for it.
translation.fr: Franchement, je crois pas que tu sois à la hauteur.

translation.en: So why don't we just call it a night?
Just say the words.
Okay, I'm a little impressed.
-Not bad. -Thanks.
Trying to impress your date, huh?
You ready to say uncle?
I'm ready for you to go to hell.
translation.fr: Prêt à t'envoyer te faire foutre.

translation.en: Leave us, Gorman.
Just say the words.
Say the words, and it's all over.
Listen to me, William.
I need you to understand me.
translation.fr: Il faut que tu me comprennes.

translation.en: Come on! Say it! Say the words!
...nothing.
He is your son.
For once in your life, think of someone other than yourself.
translation.fr: Pour une fois dans ta vie, ne pense pas qu'à toi.

translation.en: ...will...
...my power.
We searched the entire area. We didn't find anybody.
How can that be?
Where is he?
I don't know.
